channel.title: Facebook on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Do you believe in life after Facebook?
item.description: I've deleted Facebook from my phone, though I haven't closed out my account there. Look for me to be there less and here (on this blog) more. Facebook is a never ending stream. You start to look at it, and you are never done. There's never a "congratulations, you are all caught up" message to be found. It's just too big to make sense of, and too much of a potential time sink.
